text:
Hi guys, I’m trying to deploy a serverless function to HubSpot and keep getting the following error: `hubId xxxx does not have access to serverless builds.`.
We’re working on an enterprise package. Is there anything that I’m missing or is there a permission issue on HubSpot itself?
Thanks in advance!
Hello I want to  integrate the Node.js code as a HubSpot Serverless function can anyone help me?
